DOC.brief_summary: The objective study 1 ) evaluate impact novel individualize care planning/ educational technology ( On Q Care Planning System CPS ) oncology patient provider knowledge , attitude beliefs Non-Small Cell Lung Carcinoma ( NSCLC ) clinical trial , well 2 ) evaluate impact On Q CPS patient referral enrollment NSCLC clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Clinical Trial Awareness NSCLC : Pilot Testing A Novel Healthcare IT Platform Incorporating Education Point Care
DOC.criteria: All participant must 18 year age old . Patient participant must Stage III , IV and/or recurrent NSCLC . Patient participant must point treatment initiation/change evaluation treatment initiation/change Patients must work email address internet access Any participant understand write spoken English . Any participant competent provide inform consent study participation per investigator . Any participant present relate study visit and/or complete posttest assessment
